post:
VPS.NET is on a mission to rapidly our cloud, launching 7 new locations in the month of March. Our latest two additions, Paris, France and Frankfurt, Germany can be tested absolutely FREE!

Users signing up receive one free node, worth of 600 MHz of resources, 376 MB of RAM, 10 GB of Redundant SAN storage and 1 TB of bandwidth! You're then able to setup a VPS in either of the locations, without a single charge applied to your credit card.

How do I signup?
[Order Online Instantly!](https://control.vps.net/trial-signup)

Source
http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1138918

Requirements
* A Phone number you can verify
